title: Brian Jaramillo
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012064130/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012064130/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Brian Jaramillo**

Former journalist and now owner of a company in the apparel business. Posts at [Typophile](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012064130/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Typophile) under the nickname [bjharvey](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012064130/http:/typophile.com/user/1014). Lives in Long Beach, [California](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012064130/http:/typophile.com/wiki/California).
author: beejay
